restrictionByCondition.condition: OutletStatusHistory FROM InformationRegister.OutletStatusHistory AS OutletStatusHistory INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON OutletStatusHistory.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

AccountReceivable FROM Document.AccountReceivable AS AccountReceivable INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON AccountReceivable.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_AccountReceivable") AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Orders FROM Document.Order AS Orders INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Orders.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Order") AND Orders.SR IN (SELECT Territory.SR FROM Catalog.Territory AS Territory WHERE Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Region #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Regions") AND Region.Ref IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Outlets FROM Catalog.Outlet AS Outlets INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Outlets.Ref = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Outlets") AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Visit FROM Document.Visit AS Visit INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Visit.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Visit") AND Visit.SR IN (SELECT Territory.SR FROM Catalog.Territory AS Territory WHERE Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

MobileAppPlanVisit FROM Document.MobileAppPlanVisit AS MobileAppPlanVisit INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON MobileAppPlanVisit.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE MobileAppPlanVisit.SR IN (SELECT Territory.SR FROM Catalog.Territory AS Territory WHERE Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Territory #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Territories") AND Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Encashment #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Encashment") AND Encashment.Visit IN (SELECT Visit.Ref FROM Document.Visit AS Visit INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Visit.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE Visit.SR IN (SELECT Territory.SR FROM Catalog.Territory AS Territory WHERE Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

Task FROM Document.Task AS Task INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Task.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Task") AND Task.Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

AssortmentMatrix #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_AssortmentMatrix") AND AssortmentMatrix.Responsible IN (SELECT Region.Manager FROM Catalog.Region AS Region WHERE Region.Ref IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

Questionnaire #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Questionnaire") AND Questionnaire.Owner IN (SELECT Region.Manager FROM Catalog.Region AS Region WHERE Region.Ref IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

VisitPlan #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_VisitPlan") AND VisitPlan.Owner IN (SELECT Region.Manager FROM Catalog.Region AS Region WHERE Region.Ref IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND VisitPlan.SR IN (SELECT Territory.SR FROM Catalog.Territory AS Territory WHERE Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

User #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Users") AND (User.Ref IN (SELECT Territory.SR FROM Catalog.Territory AS Territory WHERE Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) OR User.Ref IN (SELECT Region.Manager FROM Catalog.Region AS Region WHERE Region.Ref IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)))

QuestioningResults FROM InformationRegister.QuestioningResults AS QuestioningResults INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON QuestioningResults.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser) AND QuestioningResults.SR IN (SELECT Territory.SR FROM Catalog.Territory AS Territory WHERE Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

restrictionTemplate.name: HaveRightToEdit
restrictionTemplate.condition:
WHERE
CASE WHEN DeletionMark = Ref.DeletionMark THEN
TRUE IN (SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM Catalog.User AS User INNER JOIN Catalog.RolesOfUsers.AccessRightsToSystemObjects AS RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects ON User.RoleOfUser = RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Ref WHERE RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.SystemObject = VALUE(#Параметр(1)) AND RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Edit = TRUE AND User.Ref = &CurrentUser)
ELSE
TRUE IN (SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM Catalog.User AS User INNER JOIN Catalog.RolesOfUsers.AccessRightsToSystemObjects AS RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects ON User.RoleOfUser = RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Ref WHERE RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.SystemObject = VALUE(#Параметр(1)) AND RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.MarkForDeletion = TRUE AND User.Ref = &CurrentUser)
END

restrictionTemplate.name: HaveRightToRead
restrictionTemplate.condition: WHERE TRUE IN (SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM Catalog.User AS User INNER JOIN Catalog.RolesOfUsers.AccessRightsToSystemObjects AS RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects ON User.RoleOfUser = RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Ref WHERE RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.SystemObject = VALUE(#Параметр(1)) AND RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Read = TRUE AND User.Ref = &CurrentUser)
